description.name: paygatedottocustom
description.tagline: Instant Approval Payment Gateway with Instant Payouts (custom provider mode)
description.long: Instant Approval High Risk Merchant Gateway with instant payouts to your USDC POLYGON wallet using custom provider you insert
features: Accept all major credit and debit cards including Visa and Mastercard directly on your site
Instant payouts to your USDC Polygon wallet
ZERO Chargebacks all payments are final.
